AKGRT.IS.summary: Aksigorta A.S. provides various non-life insurance products and services to retail and corporate customers in Turkey. It offers motor vehicle, motor third party liability, fire, marine, accident, personal accident, traffic, home and content, travel, engineering, agriculture, and health insurance products. The company provides its products through branches, independent agencies, brokers, and contracted institutions. Aksigorta A.S. was founded in 1960 and is headquartered in Istanbul, Turkey.

ANSGR.IS.summary: Anadolu Anonim TÃ¼rk Sigorta Sirketi offers non-life insurance products in Turkey. It primarily offers accident, health, motor vehicles, air vehicles, watercraft, marine, fire and natural disasters, general losses, credit, financial losses, legal protection, bond, motor vehicle liability, aircraft liability, general liability, theft, engineering, travel, agriculture, and personal accident insurance products. The company also provides insurance research, life insurance statistical, reinsurance, and fronting services, as well as disseminating information about insurance services. It serves through authorized and unauthorized agencies. The company was founded in 1925 and is headquartered in Istanbul, Turkey. Anadolu Anonim TÃ¼rk Sigorta Sirketi is a subsidiary of Milli ReasÃ¼rans T.A.S.

AVISA.IS.summary: AvivaSA Emeklilik ve Hayat A.S. engages in the pension and life insurance business primarily in Turkey. It operates through Life Protection, Life Savings, Personal Accident, and Pension segments. The Life Protection segment offers credit-linked life and non-credit-linked life policies, such as term life, return of premium, critical illness, and unemployment. The Life Savings segment offers products, which are written for a contract period. The Personal Accident segment provides coverage against disability, death, and medical expenses due to accident. The Pension segment offers a range of individual and corporate pension plans. The company was founded in 1941 and is based in Istanbul, Turkey.

RAYSG.IS.summary: Ray Sigorta Anonim Sirketi engages in the non-life insurance business in Turkey. Its insurance products include accident, health, motor vehicles, air vehicles, water vehicles, transportation, fire and natural disasters, general loss, credit, financial losses, and legal protection; home insurance; and motor third party liability insurance. The company offers its products through agencies, bank branches, brokers, and leasing companies. It serves through 1.303 authorized agencies, 98 agency brances, 50 Alternatif Bank branches, 71 Fibabanka branches, 92 broker, and 9 broker branches. The company was founded in 1958 and is headquartered in Istanbul, Turkey. Ray Sigorta Anonim Sirketi operates as a subsidiary of ATBIH GmbH.
